captions.text: [In the hall of the mountain king plays]
This sure is a long way to go for instant death...
I didn't think I was getting to death quite fast enough,...
... so I did turbo booster, so I'd be able to go farther...
Smash into it with your facehole...
Come on! I need EVEN MORE speed!
You seem to have... you got... you went a little...
Hit your target! HIT YOUR TA--
I seem to have lost my vehicle!
What is it actually take to win this game?
What a relaxing day for death!
Why did you get into it donk first?
Maybe this one will get me in there better...
Oww-that bus was coming right for me!
I don't even think my donk can protect me.
Come on! I believe in you, you beautiful bird!
All right! That's all for now!
I had a lot of fun making this one, so...
...see more Turbo Dismount in the future...

comments.text:
I've searched for the name of this song for 10 years.

Did god know I'd find it in a video about donks and exploding lego cars?

The answer is no.

When I was a young boy a movie I watched had this song, but 10 years have 
passed and only now has the name been found. Thank you Mark.﻿
